question: Which of these statements about food are your favourite?

answers.b: Pride is all very well, but a sausage is a sausage.
answers.c: A BLT, heavy on the B
answers.d: Food? I'd rather drink! Anything vaguely alcoholic (turpentine / rat poison / lamp oil etc.)

question: Which of these activities is your idea of a good time?

answers.a: Singing songs like 'The Hedgehog Can Never Be Buggered At All'
answers.b: Playing a board game with a friend
answers.d: Lying low and keeping out of trouble
